text: What?

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Aw, you're just like the government, man! Trying to prosecute outta one side of your mouth, okay, while supporting guns outta the other, 'kay?

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Aw, why don't you go to a Grateful Dead concert?

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: I can't, man. Jerry Berry's dead, nkay?

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: He-e-ey, man, I overheard what you said; that was coool!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Wha-oh. Thanks, man.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Would you like to come over to my place and fingerpaint?

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Sure, man. Fingerpaintin's cool, 'kay?

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Lincoln, Nebraska, train station. The Broflovskis get off the train, Kyle first

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Now, where did you leave him, young man?

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Aw, how the hell should I know?

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Gerald, do something about your smartass son!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Uuuh. Mind your mother, smartass.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: If we don't find him, so help me, you're gonna be grounded for a month!  Ike, love?

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: All the time: "Look out for your little brother, Kyle," "take care of your little brother, Kyle," and he wasn't even really my little brother.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Kyle, just because Ike is adopted doesn't make him any less your brother.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Yeah, right!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Excuse me, we're looking for a two-year old Canadian boy.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Two-year old Canadian boy, two-year old Canadian boy- oh, I think they might have one of those down at Hap's bar.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Come on!!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: The Broflovskis enter and scan the room, Ike is being used as a base at one table. The camera pans back to him

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Ike!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Mamatoedoe.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Hey, lady, that's my table post! You can't have that!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Mr. Mackey and the blonde are in bed admiring the fingerpainting they have done all over the room, including the ceiling

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Wow, man. You know, it's like you go through life thinking that you're an individual, nkay? And then you realize that you're more than that, 'kay. We're all just one big individual, 'kay?

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Let's get married and have a honeymoon in India.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Nkay.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Kyle's house. Home sweet cell

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Now you march to your room, and you think about what you've done!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: But first apologize to your brother

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: He's not my brother!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Apologize to him!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: I'm sorry, Ike.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Uh oh, stufid.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Somewhere in India, Mackey and the blonde are hiking. Elephants bathe in the river below them

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Wooow, this is sooo beautiful!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: I am one with the animals! And the trees!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: And I am one with you!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: At long last I have found

title: IKE S WEE WEE
role: Now I feel I can start anew-

title: IKE S WEE WEE
role: # [Mr. T flies onto him and pins him. Two other men come and
text: pick him up, then all three rough him up]

title: IKE S WEE WEE
role: Woo, whoa! Ow! Hey! [they carry him away] Uh oh hel-m. Hey!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Whoa!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Yeah I got-, mkay?

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Inside the van. Jimbo is driving, with Ned sitting next to him. Mr. Mackey sits between Mr, T and Mr. Garrison

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Uh- What the hell is going on?!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Tough love, Mr. Mackey. We're taking you to rehab.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: I don't want to go to rehab. I haven't even done drugs in weeks!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: We were wrong for shunning you, Mr. Mackey, and we apologize. We should have realized that you needed help.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Yeah, now we're gonna make sure you get the help you need.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: I don't want help!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: You're gonna thank us later.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: The big day is here. Guests are arriving

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Hello, Tom. Hello, Patty. Thanks for coming to Ike's bris.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Uh oh.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Look Ike, It's Uncle Murray

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Hello, Ike! Say, where's little Kyle?

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: He's been sent to his room for being a bastard. He's decided that Ike isn't his brother, since he's adopted.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Hi there!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Hello. Ddo I know you?

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Uhno, but I never miss a bris. Here, I brought some dip.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Ohhh, thanks.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Kyle's room. The boys are gathered there

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Well, I guess the chopping is about to commence.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Oh deh family nrr.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: What do you want?!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: I wumuh trecompr. Com. Tebruhnerr.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Oooh no you don't! That isn't gonna work on me, Canadian!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Maybe you're being too hard on him, dude.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: No way! There's no real connection between us. It was all a big lie.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Cooka monster  two three four five.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Go on, Canadian! Beat it! I'm through getting in trouble for you!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Baraterndr nfard fy.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: You have to admit you have a problem before anyone can help you.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: But I don't think I really have a problem.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Nonsense! You did drugs! I suppose you forgot all about your family.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: I don't really have a family.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: And you lost your job.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: No, I lost my job before that.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Mr. Mackey, you're supposed to be an adult.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
role: The problem with drugs is that people forget to stop doing them.
text: There's a time and a place for everything, Mr. Mackey, and it's called 'College!' Now, I want you to repeat after me- 'Drugs Are Bad.'

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Drugs are baad.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Drugs Are Bad.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Uuh. Dru- drugs are baad.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: More guests arrive for Ike's bris. Ding-dong

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Hello, Dr. Schwartz. Thank you so much for coming all this way to perform Ike's bris.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Oh, my pleasure, Sheila. I brought the normal cutting device, but then I remembered that Ike was Canadian, so I brought the right one . Where is the little rug rat?

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Right over here.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Come 'ere, you!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Oowwww!  Oh deh faminrr.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Ike? Ike?

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Heh cohcoh mondefern menurr.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: There you are. Come on Ike, it's time.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: You stay away from my little brother!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Bu-bu-but son I just-

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: You aren't gonna cut off his weewee. Not today, you sick-ass weirdo!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Kyle, what are you talking about?!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: And you! You should be ashaned of yourself! Don't you understand that us males are defined by our firemen?!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Yes. The fireman is very magical. If you rub his helmet, he spits in your eyes.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Kyle. A-a circumcision is a very common thing for Ike to have. His father had it, his grandfather had it. And  his brother had it.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: No!  No, it isn't true!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: We're not going to cut it off! We're just goin' to snip it, so it looks bigger.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Oh, hey, that doesn't sound like a bad idea!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Heyeah, I want to get a circumstision, too.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: The Betty Ford Clinic. Mr. Mackey and the social worker exit the main building

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Congratulations, Mr Mackey. You are fully recovered.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: I can't thank you enough for everything, mkay? I feel like my old self again.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Just one more thing.  Remember that you caaan stay sober.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: I will, Ms. Social Worker. I will. Mkay?

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Kyle's house. Everyone is gathered for the bris

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: It's okay, Ike. I'm here.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: And-a one and-a two and-a bris .

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Ouch. Amuhbuhbuhbuh.  Cooka monsder.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Ike, you're okay.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Whoa, dude, I guess having a bris isn't all that bad.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Yeah. You know, I've learned something today. Family isn't about whose blood you have, it's about who you care about.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Yeah.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: And that's why I feel like you guys are more than just friends. You're my family.  Except for Cartman.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Naturally.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Eah, screw you guys! I don't- wanna be in your penis-choppin' family anyway!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Monday morning, Mr. Garrison's class

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: And so now, children, your school counselor is back, to tell you first-hand about his nasty experience with drugs and alcohol.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Okay, kids? Uh- you shouldn't do drugs, nkay-drugs are bad. You see, I was at the bottom of the barrel. I was a wreck; why, I didn't even care about money. I wasuh I was wasting my life.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Hey, you guys wanna come to my bris tomorrow?

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: You can't have your bris tomorrow, Cartman, that's when I'm having mine.

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: No way, I set up mine first, hippie!

title: IKE S WEE WEE
text: Now boys, you need to listen up, onkay? Wha- what I'm talkin' about might save your life someday, mkay?

text: Uhkay, Mr. Mackey, umkay?

text: Onkay.

text: Onkay.

text: Okay?

text: Hmkay.  Now, as I was sayin, uh- drugs are bad. You shouldn't do drugs. Eh, uh if you do them, you're bad. Because drugs are bad. Mkay? It's a bad thing to do drugs, soduh so don't be bad. By doing drugs, unkay? That'd be bad. Uh drugs are bad. Unkay?
